message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.SD

Reasoning: 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper proposes a new gate structure for LSTM that enables hierarchical probabilistic modeling and alleviates the gradient vanishing problem. This falls under the domain of machine learning.
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The proposed gate structure is used in various tasks such as sentence classification, image classification, polyphonic music modeling, and image caption generation, which are all related to artificial intelligence.
- cs.CL (Computation and Language): The paper mentions the effectiveness of the proposed gate structure on sentence classification and image caption generation, which are tasks related to natural language processing.
- cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): The paper mentions the effectiveness of the proposed gate structure on image classification, which falls under the domain of computer vision.
- cs.SD (Sound): The paper mentions the effectiveness of the proposed gate structure on polyphonic music modeling, which falls under the domain of sound.
